about_the_game:
demo includes:

In this demo, you will experience the core mechanism and two major levels of the game. The game content lasts about 10 to 40 minutes (it varies from person to person).

Kitten Food Alley is a casual management sim with the theme of petting cat. You can open various food shops and adjust food recipes, produce food by petting cat employees. Unlock various tools to automate petting. Enjoy the stress relief of cyber cat petting!

  • Spend cat coins to build a store to start a new day, petting cat employees to make delicious food, and get cat coins and love.

  • Collect customer feedback and adjust food recipes to increase the store's customer visit rate.

  • Unlock useful tools with love to better achieve the goal. Once the goal is achieved, you can enter the next level.

  • When petting a cat, there will be lovely graphic animations and sound feedback.

  • There are 12 different types of stores in the game, such as popsicle stores, dumpling stores, and jianbing guozi stores.(There are 5 types of shops in the demo)

  • The game has a total of 5 levels. After unlocking each level, new items can be obtained. Reasonable use of various items can increase the efficiency of petting cats.(Demo has 2 Levels)

  • Reasonably arrange props to let the cat store operate on its own.

  • Simple goals that can be accomplished without too much thought.

What Kitten Food Alley does not offer:

  • Customizable content.

  • Complex business strategy.

  • Task goals with pressure or time limits.

name: Kitten Food Alley Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Kitten Food Alley is a casual management sim with the theme of petting cat. You can open various food shops and adjust food recipes, produce food by petting cat employees. Unlock various tools to automate petting. Enjoy the stress relief of cyber cat petting!
